General.Name: China United Travel Co Ltd
General.Description: China Tourism And Culture Investment Group Co.,Ltd engages in the investment and operation of cultural, tourism, and sports projects in China. It is also involved in the internet digital marketing; travel and stylistic services; hotel and investment management; catering services; and advertising businesses. The company was formerly known as China United Travel Co.,Ltd. China Tourism And Culture Investment Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Nanchang, China.
General.Address: Alpha Office Building, Building 34, Nanchang, China, 330038
